name: Netflix Color Plus
description: I will no longer be supporting this style here. if you'd like to you can install my new Netflix Color Plus Add-on/extension for Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox below: Netflix Color Plus for Google Chrome Netflix Color Plus for Mozilla Firefox Additionally If you would like to help me out, you can Buy me a coffee! :)

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!
